text: Seth Caldwell. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Caldwell S (2022). whoville: Country Codes, Names, Metadata , UN WB. R package version 0.1.7, https://github.com/gpw13/ghost.
code: @Manual{,   title = {whoville: Country Codes, Names, and Other Metadata from the WHO, UN and WB},   author = {Seth Caldwell},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.1.7},   url = {https://github.com/gpw13/ghost}, }

what: Country Codes, Names, and Other Metadata from the WHO, UN and WB
title: Country Codes, Names, and Other Metadata from the WHO, UN and WB
text: goal whoville provide package country reference data published World Health Organization, United Nations World Bank easily accessible R. moment, reference dataset set functions work country codes names, allowing easy conversion names codes well easy access region codes, member status, published country metadata. used assist work ’s Division Data, Analytics, Delivery Impact’s Global Programme Work 13.

title: Country Codes, Names, and Other Metadata from the WHO, UN and WB
text: functions built help turn names country codes ISO3 codes: names_to_code() workhorse function helps match country names returns standardized country codes. names_to_iso3() wrapper around names_to_code() automatically outputs ISO3 code. codes_to_iso3() converts country codes ISO3 format. valid_codes() lets quickly check country codes vector recognized whoville package. functions encourage tidy R workflow ISO3 codes used unique identifier country: iso3_to_regions() takes vector ISO3 codes returns specified region values. iso3_to_codes() takes vector ISO3 codes returns specified country codes. iso3_to_names() takes vector ISO3 codes returns specified country names. is_who_member() takes vector ISO3 codes checks member state . is_oecd_member() takes vector ISO3 codes checks OECD member state . is_gbd_high_income() takes vector ISO3 codes checks classified high-income 2019 GBD IHME. functions built top countries data frame also exported package developed public datasets provided World Health Organization United Nations. Details available ?countries.

title: Country Codes, Names, and Other Metadata from the WHO, UN and WB
text: can install whoville Github :

title: Country Codes, Names, and Other Metadata from the WHO, UN and WB
text: unclean data frame country names, can use names_to_codes() match ISO3 codes. function matches names vector across possible names found countries data frame. ISO3 codes exact matches always returned, user specific options non-exact matches. can fuzzy matched (default), always made NA, require user input confirm fuzzy matching results. Fuzzy matches always return message user confirmed match. details available ?names_to_codes. Since functions vectorized, can easily use normal workflow, especially ’re using tidyverse. , can clean tidy names get correct UN region income group countries, well name Chinese:
code: library(whoville)  names_to_code(c("Venezuela", "Arentina", "afghanist")) #> 'arentina' has no exact match. Closest name found was 'argentina'. #> 'afghanist' has no exact match. Closest name found was 'afghanistan'. #> [1] "VEN" "ARG" "AFG" library(dplyr) df <- data.frame(c_names = c("Venezuela", "Arentina", "afghanist"))  df %>%   mutate(iso3 = names_to_code(c_names),          un_region = iso3_to_regions(iso3, region = "un_region"),          wb_ig = iso3_to_regions(iso3, region = "wb_ig"),          name_zh = iso3_to_names(iso3, org = "un", language = "zh")) #>     c_names iso3 un_region wb_ig                name_zh #> 1 Venezuela  VEN        19   UMC 委内瑞拉玻利瓦尔共和国 #> 2  Arentina  ARG        19   UMC                 阿根廷 #> 3 afghanist  AFG       142   LIC                 阿富汗

what: Get ISO3 codes from other country codes. — codes_to_iso3
title: Get ISO3 codes from other country codes. — codes_to_iso3
text: codes_to_iso3() takes vector country codes returns ISO3 codes.

title: Get ISO3 codes from other country codes. — codes_to_iso3
Get ISO3 codes from other country codes. — codes_to_iso3
text: codes Character vector country codes. type character value specifying type country code return. possible values available country_code_types().

title: Get ISO3 codes from other country codes. — codes_to_iso3
text: Character vector.

what: Country metadata from the WHO, UN, and WB. — countries
title: Country metadata from the WHO, UN, and WB. — countries
text: dataset containing names, codes, attributes countries included World Health Organization, United Nations World Bank datasets.

title: Country metadata from the WHO, UN, and WB. — countries
Country metadata from the WHO, UN, and WB. — countries
text: data frame 249 rows 109 variables: iso3 ISO3 code. iso2 ISO2 code. iso_numeric ISO numeric code. who_code World Health Organization code. m49 United Nations M49 code. gbd_code IHME GBD country code. sovereign_iso3 ISO3 code sovereign nation. Value NA sovereign . who_member Logical, country member state? who_member_small Logical, country member state population <= 90,000? oecd_member Logical, country OECD member state? gbd_high_income Logical, country classified high-income IHME's GBD 2019? un_ldc Logical, country classified least-developed country United Nations? un_lldc Logical, country classified land-locked developing country United Nations? un_sids Logical, country classified small island developing state United Nations? who_short_name_en country name, short, English. who_formal_name_en country name, formal, English. available official member states. who_short_name_ar country name, short, Arabic. who_formal_name_ar country name, formal, Arabic. available official member states. who_short_name_es country name, short, Spanish. who_formal_name_es country name, formal, Spanish. available official member states. who_short_name_fr country name, short, French. who_formal_name_fr country name, formal, French. available official member states. who_short_name_ru country name, short, Russian. who_formal_name_ru country name, formal, Russian. available official member states. who_short_name_zh country name, short, Chinese. who_formal_name_zh country name, formal, Chinese. available official member states. un_name_en UN country name, English. un_name_ru UN country name, Russian. un_name_fr UN country name, French. un_name_es UN country name, Spanish. un_name_ar UN country name, Arabic. un_name_zh UN country name, Chinese. alt_name_en Alternative (non-official) country name, English. alt_name_2_en Another alternative (non-official) country name, English. alt_name_3_en Another alternative (non-official) country name, English. alt_name_4_en Another alternative (non-official) country name, title: Country metadata from the WHO, UN, and WB. — countries
text: World Health Organization country reference table, accessed September 23 2020. United Nations Statistics Division, Country Area Codes Statistical Use tables; accessed August 15 2020. World Bank income groups, fiscal years 1989 - 2021, regions, accessed August 15 2020. Organisation Economic Co-operation Development membership list, accessed 1 February 2021. Institute Health Metrics Evaluation Global Burden Disease 2019 Socio-Demographic Index data, accessed 1 February 2021. United Nations Committee Development Policy, list least developed countries, accessed 16 February 2021. United Nations Department Economic Social Affairs, Population Division (2020). International Migrant Stock 2020. Global Burden Disease 2019 country regional classifications, Institute Health Metrics Evaluation.

what: Get OECD membership status from ISO3 codes. — is_oecd_member

what: Get country names from ISO3 country codes. — iso3_to_names

code: iso3_to_names(   iso3,   org = c("who", "un"),   type = c("short", "formal"),   language = c("en", "es", "ru", "ar", "zh", "fr") )

title: Get country names from ISO3 country codes. — iso3_to_names
text: iso3 Character vector ISO3 codes. org Official names organization return. Can either "" (default) "un". type "short" (default) "formal" name return. used org "". language character value specifying language country names. specified using ISO2 language code. Defaults "en", matching available 6 official languages. Possible values "en", "es", "ar", "fr", "ru", "zh".

title: Get country names from ISO3 country codes. — iso3_to_names
text: Character vector.

what: Get regions from ISO3 country codes. — iso3_to_regions
title: Get regions from ISO3 country codes. — iso3_to_regions
text: iso3_to_regions() takes vector ISO3 codes returns vector specified regions. Currently, can codes English names UN regions/subregions/intermediate regions, UN DESA regions/subregions, SDG regions/subregions, regions, World Bank geographical regions Income Groups.

title: Get regions from ISO3 country codes. — iso3_to_regions
code: iso3_to_regions(   iso3,   region = c("who_region", "un_region", "un_subregion", "un_intermediate_region",     "sdg_region", "sdg_subregion", "gbd_region", "gbd_subregion", "un_desa_region",     "un_desa_subregion", "wb_region", "wb_ig"),   year = max(wb_ig_years()),   name = FALSE,   language = c("en", "es", "ru", "ar", "zh", "fr") )

title: Get regions from ISO3 country codes. — iso3_to_regions
text: iso3 Character vector ISO3 codes. region Type region return. Regional classifications available , UN, UNSD SDGs, UN DESA, World Bank (geographic income based), IHME's GBD. See countries documentation source details. year World Bank Income Group , specify year return. name UN, UNSD SDG, UN DESA, WB IHME GBD regions . TRUE, return official regional name instead code. language "un_region", "un_subregion", "un_intermediate_region" returning name. character value specifying language country names. specified using ISO2 language code.

title: Get regions from ISO3 country codes. — iso3_to_regions
text: Character vector.

what: Get country codes from names. — names_to_code
title: Get country codes from names. — names_to_code
text: names_to_codes() takes vector country names returns vector specified country codes.

title: Get country codes from names. — names_to_code
code: names_to_code(   names,   type = "iso3",   language = c("en", "es", "ru", "ar", "zh", "fr"),   ignore_case = T,   fuzzy_matching = c("yes", "no", "user_input"),   method = "jw",   p = 0.1 )

title: Get country codes from names. — names_to_code
text: names character vector country names. type character value specifying type country code return. Defaults ISO3. possible values available country_code_types(). language character value specifying language country names. specified using ISO2 language code. Defaults "en", matching available 6 official languages. Possible values "en", "es", "ar", "fr", "ru", "zh". ignore_case logical value specifying whether ignore case string matching. Defaults TRUE. fuzzy_matching character value specifying whether fuzzy matching, require user input exact match found. Defaults "yes". method character value specifying distance method use fuzzy matching exact match found. Defaults Jaro-Winker due value matching names. See stringdist::stringdist() possible methods. p numeric value 0 0.25 specifying penalty factor Jaro-Winkler distance. Ignored method "jw".

title: Get country codes from names. — names_to_code
text: vector country codes matched names.

title: Get country codes from names. — names_to_code
text: function first searches exact matches countries data frame, none found, uses fuzzy matching guess country. Matching done using stringdist fuzzy matching methods, although names_to_codes() allows user fuzzy matching (non-exact matches returned NA) require user input.

what: Get ISO3  codes from names — names_to_iso3

title: Get ISO3  codes from names — names_to_iso3
code: names_to_iso3(   names,   language = c("en", "es", "ru", "ar", "zh", "fr"),   ignore_case = T,   fuzzy_matching = c("yes", "no", "user_input"),   method = "jw",   p = 0.1 )

title: Get ISO3  codes from names — names_to_iso3
text: names character vector country names. language character value specifying language country names. specified using ISO2 language code. Defaults "en", matching available 6 official languages. Possible values "en", "es", "ar", "fr", "ru", "zh". ignore_case logical value specifying whether ignore case string matching. Defaults TRUE. fuzzy_matching character value specifying whether fuzzy matching, require user input exact match found. Defaults "yes". method character value specifying distance method use fuzzy matching exact match found. Defaults Jaro-Winker due value matching names. See stringdist::stringdist() possible methods. p numeric value 0 0.25 specifying penalty factor Jaro-Winkler distance. Ignored method "jw".

title: Get ISO3  codes from names — names_to_iso3
text: vector country codes matched names.

title: Get ISO3  codes from names — names_to_iso3
text: function first searches exact matches countries data frame, none found, uses fuzzy matching guess country. Matching done using stringdist fuzzy matching methods, although names_to_codes() allows user fuzzy matching (non-exact matches returned NA) require user input.

Get ISO3 codes for WHO member states. — who_member_states
text: include Subset member states return. * "": member states (default) * "small": Small member states (2018 population < 90,000) * "large": Large member states (2018 population >= 90,000)

title: whoville 0.1.7
text: IHME’s GBD codes regional classifications added allow conversion ISO3 GBD codes, well use GBD regions analyses.

title: whoville 0.1.6
text: Minor change accommodate new formatting World Bank’s historical classification income countries.

title: whoville 0.1.5
text: Added UN intermediate regions, UN DESA regions subregions, SDG regions subregions.

title: whoville 0.1.4
text: Small island developing states (SIDS) land-locked developing countries (LLDC) classifications added countries. Additional alt names official ISO3 short names added.

title: whoville 0.1.3
text: UN region subregion names added every language, can accessed using iso3_to_regions(). OECD membership added, usable is_oecd_member() `oecd_member_states(). GBD 2019 high-income countries added, usable is_gbd_high_income() gbd_high_income_states(). UN least-developed country status added, usable is_un_ldc() un_ldcs().
